main.name: Cameron Jude Luyt
main.bio: I am a hard working individual with the capacity to accomplish any task, due to my creative problem solving abilities. I have a lifelong passion for technology and knowledge, in general, and am always eager and motivated to broaden my knowledge. I aim to be a productive and efficient team member with the ability to lead as well. My main goal is to become a full stack developer with great expertise within the position.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Very much a work experience where I managed to learn many different languages in coding such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, etc. I also experienced personal and professional development.
There are three words that describes Mondale High and its students.Discipline, Dedication and Determination.

work.title: Score-Keeper
work.description: Kept track of the score, did match reports after each game and organised drinks after each game.

projects.title: User Profile System
projects.category: A site that stores user cards.

projects.title: GitHub Finder
projects.category: A site that fetches user profiles from GitHub.

projects.title: Contact-Keeper
projects.category: A site that stores users along with contacts they desire to keep.

testimonials.text: Cameron is a fantastic developer to work with. In addition to his pleasant personality, Cameron is co-operative and willing to learn.
testimonials.user: Godwin Dzvapatsva(Head of Curriculum and Learning)

testimonials.text: He produces excellent work, and has a great work ethic, and also a team player
Cameron's a creative thinker and determined individual. He has great potential and willl be an asset to any workplace
